panels.content:
Flow Data by Science Discipline

This dashboard shows the science disciplines for top talkers using the NetSage Science Registry.
The Sankey graph shows the top ten source organizations by volume for the selected disciplines and their associated top five destination organizations.
Thicker lines indicate larger flows.
Please note that rate will be zero if only one sampled flow was detected.
All times are displayed in browser local time.

panels.content:
Summary of All Disciplines

Only flows where source or destination has been tagged with a science discipline
from the Science Registry and were seen by the selected sensor(s) are counted.
If you have any questions, concerns, or other issues, feel free to contact us at netsage@iu.edu. Thanks! NSF GRANT 1540933 To Review the NetSage Data Policy click here
